Token.Abstract: Returns the AWSPinpointEventRecorder which is the low level client used to record events to local storage.

ReturnValue.Abstract: the AWSPinpointEventRecorder used for storing events.

Token.Abstract: Returns the AWSPinpointEventRecorder which is the low level client used to record events to local storage.

ReturnValue.Abstract: the AWSPinpointEventRecorder used for storing events.

Token.Abstract: Returns the AWSPinpointEventRecorder which is the low level client used to record events to local storage.

ReturnValue.Abstract: the AWSPinpointEventRecorder used for storing events.

Token.Abstract: Adds the specified attribute to all subsequent recorded events.

Parameter.Name: theValue
Parameter.Abstract: the value of the attribute.

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the attribute to add.

Token.Abstract: Adds the specified attribute to all subsequent recorded events with the specified event type.

Parameter.Name: theValue
Parameter.Abstract: the value of the attribute.

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the attribute to add.

Parameter.Name: theEventType
Parameter.Abstract: the type of events to add the attribute to.

Token.Abstract: Adds the specified metric to all subsequent recorded events.

Parameter.Name: theValue
Parameter.Abstract: the value of the metric

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the metric to add

Token.Abstract: Adds the specified metric to all subsequent recorded events with the specified event type.

Parameter.Name: theValue
Parameter.Abstract: the value of the metric

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the metric to add

Parameter.Name: theEventType
Parameter.Abstract: the type of events to add the metric to

Token.Abstract: Removes the specified attribute. All subsequent recorded events will no longer have this global attribute.

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the key of the attribute to remove

Token.Abstract: Removes the specified attribute. All subsequent recorded events with the specified event type will no longer have this global attribute.

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the key of the attribute to remove

Parameter.Name: theEventType
Parameter.Abstract: the type of events to remove the attribute from

Token.Abstract: Removes the specified metric. All subsequent recorded events will no longer have this global metric.

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the key of the metric to remove

Token.Abstract: Removes the specified metric. All subsequent recorded events with the specified event type will no longer have this global metric.

Parameter.Name: theKey
Parameter.Abstract: the key of the metric to remove

Parameter.Name: theEventType
Parameter.Abstract: the type of events to remove the metric from

Token.Abstract: Records the specified AWSPinpointEvent to the local filestore.

Parameter.Name: theEvent
Parameter.Abstract: The AWSPinpointEvent to persist

Token.Abstract: Create an AWSPinpointEvent with the specified theEventType

Parameter.Name: theEventType
Parameter.Abstract: the type of event to create

ReturnValue.Abstract: an AWSPinpointEvent with the specified event type

Token.Abstract: Create an Apple monetization AWSPinpointEvent of type "_monetization.purchase" with the specified parameters.

Parameter.Name: transaction
Parameter.Abstract: A SKPaymentTransaction object returned from an IAP

Parameter.Name: product
Parameter.Abstract: A SKProduct object of the an IAP

ReturnValue.Abstract: an AWSPinpointEvent with the specified event type

Token.Abstract: Create a Virtual monetization AWSPinpointEvent of type "_monetization.purchase" with the specified parameters.

Parameter.Name: theProductId
Parameter.Abstract: A product identifier for your virtual monitization event

Parameter.Name: theItemPrice
Parameter.Abstract: An item price for your virtual monitization event

Parameter.Name: theQuantity
Parameter.Abstract: A quantity of how many products sold for your virtual monitization event

Parameter.Name: theCurrency
Parameter.Abstract: The currency for your virtual monitization event

ReturnValue.Abstract: an AWSPinpointEvent with the specified event type

Token.Abstract: Submits all recorded events to Pinpoint. Events are automatically submitted when the application goes into the background.

ReturnValue.Abstract: AWSTask - task.result contains successful submitted events.

Token.Abstract: Submits all recorded events to Pinpoint. Events are automatically submitted when the application goes into the background.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block to be executed after submission has completed.
